title: Missing skin from crafting?
body:
So I had 5 Key Fragments and 2 Chests today, and I decided to open 1 of the chests. First, I got like 350 orange essence, ok awesome. Then the next thing that showed up was "Omega Squad Teemo." BUT, it did a wierd thing. It didn't post to my "skin shards collection area." Instead, it was just gone completely after I pressed ok. Then on the top right of my client under my username it had a little popup that said "Omega Squad Teemo has been added to your inventory." Cool...except when I went back to the RP store, it says I do not own the OS Teemo skin. Not cool. And I even tested it out on a game, I "do not own the skin" and was not able to select it.

I've opened a dozen of chests but this is the first time something went missing. Can anyone give me insight? Furthermore, is this even trackable? I'm not sure if I should open a support ticket because I'm not even sure where this would fall under?

EDIT: I've also restarted my client but to no avail.

replies.body: Looking into this, it looks like you unlocked the Omega Squad Teemo Icon.  This is the Summoner Icon and not the skin.  It was redeemed from a champion mastery chest that was unlocked yesterday that included the icon as well as 150 orange essences.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Thanks for the clear up! (I've never gotten an icon or knew you could get one from the chests so I assumed it was a skin).
